_sText:
DEATHRUN_DELUXE - beta version First off I want to thank every deathrun mappers out there that inspired me to do this map. This map has a total of 64 Spawns, 3 Terrorists and 61 Counter-terrorists. To play this map your server should have sv_airaccelarate set to "150" or more and phys_timescale to atleast "1.5". It has some "secrets" that are easy to reach and wont affect the gameplay much. I hope its fun to play this map and I hope you enjoy it.
30+ TRAPS23 CONTROLED TRAPS 7+ NON-CONTROLED
AT THE END At the end if a CT or more survive they can select one of three optional levels: M3 - both teams run/jump to the middle, catch the m3 and kill the oposite team. TMP - CTs spawn with a TMP and Ts with a knife each. The goal is to kill the oposite team aswell. HEGrenade - CTs have 3 grenades to kill the T team and if they fail they can still break the glass kill them or be killed. I'm hoping to receive good and constructive feedback so I can improve this map. If you find any bug please let me know. ALSO let me know if you make itension of running this map on a server! HAVE FUN
